name: Scientific American cleaner
description:
* clean up all irrelevant parts
* recognize articles, slideshows and 60-second-science podcasts on SciAm
* work better after adding this:
scientificamerican.com##DIV[style="margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; background: transparent url(/assets/img/interface/toolDrop.gif) repeat-x scroll left top; overflow: hidden; display: block; float: left; clear: both; width: 623px; height: 10px; -moz-background-clip: -moz-initial; -moz-background-origin: -moz-initial; -moz-background-inline-policy: -moz-initial;"]
  to the Adblock Plus filter
